Interface CarRepository

All Superinterfaces:
CarRepositoryCustom, CrudRepository<CarEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository<CarEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.jpa.repository.JpaRepository<CarEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListCrudRepository<CarEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.ListPagingAndSortingRepository<CarEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.PagingAndSortingRepository<CarEntity,Long>, org.springframework.data.repository.query.QueryByExampleExecutor<CarEntity>, org.springframework.data.repository.Repository<CarEntity,Long>
public interface CarRepository extends CrudRepository<CarEntity,Long>, CarRepositoryCustom
Repository interface for CarEntity, extending the basic CRUD functionality and custom queries.

This interface provides methods for performing operations on the CarEntity data, including filtering, aggregation, and complex queries related to car statistics.

  • Method Details

    • findCarEntitiesBySpeedBetween

      List<CarEntity> findCarEntitiesBySpeedBetween(int speedFrom, int speedTo)
      Finds all cars with a speed between the given range.
      Parameters:
      speedFrom - the lower bound of the speed.
      speedTo - the upper bound of the speed.
      Returns:
      a list of CarEntity objects that match the speed range.

    • findAll

      List<CarEntity> findAll(org.springframework.data.jpa.domain.Specification<CarEntity> spec)
      Finds all cars based on the given specifications.
      Parameters:
      spec - the specification used for filtering the cars.
      Returns:
      a list of CarEntity objects that match the specification.

    • findPriceSpeedStatistics

      @Query("select new com.app.persistence.view.PriceSpeedStatisticView(\nmin(ce.price), max(ce.price), avg(ce.price), min(ce.speed), max(ce.speed), avg(ce.speed))\nfrom CarEntity ce\n") Optional<PriceSpeedStatisticView> findPriceSpeedStatistics()
      Fetches statistics on car prices and speeds, including the minimum, maximum, and average values.
      Returns:
      an Optional containing a PriceSpeedStatisticView with the statistics of the cars.

    • findCarsCloseToPrice

      @Query("select c from CarEntity c\nwhere abs(c.price - :price) = (\n select min(abs(car.price - :price))\n from CarEntity car\n)\n") List<CarEntity> findCarsCloseToPrice(@Param("price") BigDecimal price)
      Finds the car that is closest in price to the provided price.
      Parameters:
      price - the price to compare the cars to.
      Returns:
      a list of CarEntity objects with the price closest to the given price.
